about_the_game:
An emotional, 3rd-person adventure story game about a cat separated from his family who are dealing with cancer. Players take control of the cat on a touching and beautiful journey as he tries to reunite with his family. Along the way, players can uncover relics and stories from the families struggle as they become interlaced in the cat's voyage.

Key Features:

  • For fans of story-driven games like Journey, Firewatch, and The First Tree.
  • An emotional, intimate story with an ending will stick with you
  • A short game focused on story with some mini games and platforming.
